RlnOfActyToAccomOfExmptPrpsGrp.RelationshipStatementTxt: CAPITAL GAINS ON SALE OF INVESTMENTS

ReasonableCauseExplanation.ExplanationTxt: DUE TO EXTREME MEDICAL ISSUES OF ONE OF THE DIRECTORS OF THE FOUNDATION, THE DATA TO PROPERLY PREPARE THE TAX RETURN WAS DELAYED, AND THEREFORE, THE RETURN WAS FILED A FEW DAYS LATE.
